tr_quotes.quote: Bilimsiz din kör, dinsiz bilim ise topaldır.
tr_quotes.author: Bilcell Murtaza

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim gerçeğe giden yolları aydınlatan ışıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Hacı Bektaş-i Veli

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanı sadece bilim ve sanat yüceltebilir
tr_quotes.author: Beethoven

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal bilimden daha önemlidir, çünkü bilim sınırlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim ve sanat takdir edilmediği yerden göç eder.
tr_quotes.author: İbn-i Sina

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim bize gerçeği vadeder barışı ya da mutluluğu değil.
tr_quotes.author: Gustave Le Bon

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim, ancak hedefine eriştiğini hayal ettiği zaman tehlikelidir.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim ahlaksız bir adamın elinde kötülük yapmak için güçlü bir silahtır.
tr_quotes.author: Denis Fonvizin

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi sermayemdir, bilim silahımdır, sabır giysimdir, yetinmek en üstün kazancımdır.
tr_quotes.author: Seneca

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar hayret etmeyi severler, ilmin tohumu da budur.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim insanının arzuları ve zaafları olmamalı, bir nevi taş gibi bir kalbi olmalı.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Darwin

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim organize edilmiş bilgi, bilgiler de organize edilmiş hayattır.
tr_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

tr_quotes.quote: Günümüz insanlarına gerçek, kendini yalnız ilim yoluyla kabul ettirebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Alexis Carrel

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim iyi zamanlarda servet kötü zamanlarda bir sığınak ve iyi bir yol göstericidir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristo

tr_quotes.quote: Bilimleri öğrenmeye, bizi kölelikten kurtaracak olan bilimlerden başlayalım.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim ve tekniğin, yeni sorun yaratmadan bir sorunu çözebildiğim hatırlamıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Hayır bilim bir hayal değildir; fakat onun bize vermediği şeyleri başka bir yerde bulacağımızı sanmak bir hayaldir.
tr_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

tr_quotes.quote: Bilimi, bugünkü bilimin dar çerçevesinden çıkarıp bilim üstüne getirdiğimiz an, tam bilim olur.
tr_quotes.author: Isaac Newton

tr_quotes.quote: Bilimin asıl amacı yeni kanıtlar bulmak değil, bunlarla ilgili yeni düşünce biçimleri keşfetmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Sir William Bragg

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim, deneylerin düzenli bir şekilde sıralanışıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim bütün dünyanın malıdır, ulusların sınırlarını tanımaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim insanının arzuları ve zaafları olmamalı, bir nevi taş gibi bir kalbi olmalı.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Darwin

tr_quotes.quote: Bilimsel gücümüz, manevi gücümüzün önüne geçti. Güdümlü füzelerimiz, ve güdümsüz insanlarımız var.
tr_quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi sermayemdir, bilim silahımdır, sabır giysimdir, yetinmek en üstün kazancımdır.
tr_quotes.author: Seneca

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim ve sanat bütün dünyanın malıdır, milletlerin sınırlarını tanımaz.
tr_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Her şeyin en büyüğü ilim ve bilimdir. Çünkü ilim ile Hakk'a yol bulunur, bilim ile halka tahammül edilir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: İki tür insan daima açtır, biri bilimi arayan, diğeri de parayı.
tr_quotes.author: Yusuf İslam

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal bilimden daha önemlidir, çünkü bilim sınırlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Yeryüzündeki şartların düzelmesi, sadece bilimsel buluşlardan çok ahlaklı bir yaşama düzeninin gerçekleşmesine bağlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim, her günkü düşünmelerimizin saflaşmasından başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Bilimsiz din kör, dinsiz bilim ise topaldır.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim atom bombasını üretti, fakat asıl kötülük insanların beyinlerinde ve kalplerindedir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Fiziği görelilik ilkesine sokmak fikrini rastgele bulmama teşekkürler, siz (ve diğerleri) benim bilimsel yeteneklerimi beni rahatsız edecek kadar çok abartıyorsunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim ve sanat takdir edilmediği yerden göç eder.
tr_quotes.author: İbni Sina

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim, iyi zamanlarda servet, kötü zamanlarda bir sığınak ve iyi bir yol göstericidir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim bütünü, tarih tikeli, sanat da mümkünü bildirir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: Bilimsiz şiir, temelsiz duvara benzer.
tr_quotes.author: Fuzuli

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçeklikle karşılaştırıldığında, bilimde vardığımız düzey ilkeldir, çocuk oyuncağıdır. Ama sahip olduğumuz en değerli şey odur.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Adalet olmadan bilgi, ilim değil kurnazlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Eflatun

tr_quotes.quote: Ulaşılacak her bilgiye bilimsel yöntemlerle ulaşmak gerekir. Bilimce bulgulanamayacak şeyleri insanlar bilemez.
tr_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer bu dünya bir gün kıtlık ve sefalet yaşarsa biz insanları din değil, bilim kurtaracak.
tr_quotes.author: Celal Şengör

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim gerçeği bulduğunu değil, yanlışı teşhis edip onu elediğini iddia eder.
tr_quotes.author: Celal Şengör

tr_quotes.quote: Din-bilim diyaloğu olacaksa, ya bilimi adam gibi öğreneceksin, ya bilimden gelen adamlara saygı göstereceksin.
tr_quotes.author: Celal Şengör

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın doğası gereği elimizde olan yegane bilimdir. Yine de bugüne kadar en fazla ihmal edilmiş olandır.
tr_quotes.author: David Hume

tr_quotes.quote: Söz konusu bilimse, binlercesinin otoritesi, tek bir kişinin mantıklamasından değerli değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim bize gerçeği yahut, hiç olmazsa zekamızca anlaşılması mümkün münasebetleri öğretmeyi vaadetti. Bilim bize hiçbir zaman ne barış, ne de saadet getireceğini vadetmedi.
tr_quotes.author: Gustave Le Bon

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim olmadan yapılan bilim felsefesi boştur, bilim felsefesi olmadan yapılan bilim ise kör.
tr_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer daha uzağı görebiliyorsam bu, benden önceki devlerin omuzlarında durduğum içindir.
tr_quotes.author: Isaac Newton

tr_quotes.quote: Bilim önceden görülmeyen yetkinleştirmelere elverişli olduğu halde, dinsel dünya görüşü öyle değildir; bu anlayış başlıca bölümlerinde değişmez kalmaktadır; eğer yanlışsa hep öyle kalacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

tr_quotes.quote: Okul sayesinde, okulun vereceği ilim ve fen sayesindedir ki, Türk milleti, Türk sanatı, Türk iktisadiyatı, Türk şiir ve edebiyatı bütün güzellikleriyle gelişir.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Benim manevi mirasım ilim ve akıldır.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada her şey için, medeniyet için, hayat için, muvaffakiyet için en hakiki mürşit bilimdir, fendir. Bilim ve fennin haricinde mürşit aramak gaflettir, cehalettir, dalâlettir.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta en hakiki mürşit bilimdir. Bilim ve fennin yaşadığımız her dakikadaki safhalarının gelişimini anlamak ve ilerlemelerini takip etmek şarttır.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Cahiller bilime hakaretle bakar, eğitimsizler ona hayran olur, bilgeler ise ondan yararlanırlar
tr_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Edep ehli ilimden hali olmaz, edepsiz ilim okuyan alim olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Yunus Emre

tr_quotes.quote: Girdim ilim meclisine eyledim taleb, dediler ilim geride illa edeb illa edeb.
tr_quotes.author: Yunus Emre

tr_quotes.quote: Cibilliyetsize ilim öğretmek, eşkıyanın eline kılıç vermektir.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Gezdim Halep ile Şam'ı, eyledim ilm-i talep. Meğer ilim bir hiç imiş, ille edeb ille edeb.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Akıl gibi mal, iyi huy gibi dost, edep gibi miras ve ilim gibi şeref olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Önce ilim tahsil ediniz sonra helalinden para kazanıp evleniniz.
tr_quotes.author: Hacı Bayram Veli

tr_quotes.quote: İlimden gidilmeyen yolun sonu karanlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Hacı Bektaş-i Veli

tr_quotes.quote: Cahil ile dost olma ilim bilmez, irfan bilmez, söz bilmez, üzülürsün.
tr_quotes.author: Şeyh Edebali

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar nasıl konuşulması gerektiğinin dersini alırlar. Ama en büyük ilim, nasıl ve ne zaman susulması gerektiğini bilmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Lev Nikolayeviç Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Vardım ilim meclisine, eyledim ilmi talep, ilim sonra gelir dediler, illa edep illa edep.
tr_quotes.author: Yunus Emre

tr_quotes.quote: Tek neşe bu dünyada var olmanın sevinci / Ve tek ilim, varlığın bilinmeden bilinci.
tr_quotes.author: Necip Fazıl Kısakürek

tr_quotes.quote: İlim maldan daha hayırlıdır malı sen korursun ilim seni korur mal harcamakla biter ilim paylaşmakla artar.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Kim ilim talep ederse, bu kişi, geçmişteki günahlarına kefaret olur.
tr_quotes.author: Tirmizi, İlim 2

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların en mutlusu kalbi ilimle dolu ve bedeni sabırla süslü olup elindeki ile yetinen kişidir.
tr_quotes.author: Süfyan-ı Sevri

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgelik (ilim), mukaddes bir müessesedir.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Science is a beautiful gift to humanity; we should not distort it
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: We can lick gravity, but sometimes the paperwork is overwhelming
en_quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

en_quotes.quote: Science knows no country, because knowledge belongs to humanity, and is the torch which illuminates the world
en_quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

en_quotes.quote: Most people say that it is the intellect which makes a great scientist. They are wrong: it is character
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: No amount of experimentation can ever prove me right; a single experiment can prove me wrong
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Bad times have a scientific value. These are occasions a good learner would not miss
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Research is what I'm doing when I don't know what I'm doing
en_quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

en_quotes.quote: Science has not yet taught us if madness is or is not the sublimity of the intelligence
en_quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

en_quotes.quote: Science is the captain, and practice the soldiers
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: The art and science of asking questions is the source of all knowledge
en_quotes.author: Thomas Berger

en_quotes.quote: Science literacy is the artery through which the solutions of tomorrow's problems flow
en_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

en_quotes.quote: The very nature of science is discoveries, and the best of those discoveries are the ones you don't expect
en_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

en_quotes.quote: If the facts don't fit the theory, change the facts
en_quotes.author: Unknown

en_quotes.quote: Medicine is a science of uncertainty and an art of probability
en_quotes.author: William Osler

en_quotes.quote: There are in fact two things, science and opinion; the former begets knowledge, the latter ignorance
en_quotes.author: Hippocrates

en_quotes.quote: Science is a way of thinking much more than it is a body of knowledge
en_quotes.author: Carl Sagan

en_quotes.quote: Equipped with his five senses, man explores the universe around him and calls the adventure Science
en_quotes.author: Edwin Powell Hubble

en_quotes.quote: Software Engineering might be science; but that's not what I do. I'm a hacker, not an engineer
en_quotes.author: Jamie Zawinski

en_quotes.quote: Science is what you know, philosophy is what you don't know
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: I am among those who think that science has great beauty
en_quotes.author: Marie Curie

en_quotes.quote: In questions of science, the authority of a thousand is not worth the humble reasoning of a single individual
en_quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

en_quotes.quote: The whole of science is nothing more than a refinement of everyday thinking
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Each problem that I solved became a rule, which served afterwards to solve other problems
en_quotes.author: Rene Descartes

en_quotes.quote: Our scientific power has outrun our spiritual power. We have guided missiles and misguided men
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Scientific research is one of the most exciting and rewarding of occupations
en_quotes.author: Frederick Sanger

en_quotes.quote: The brain is one of the richest green fields of science. There's so much yet to be discovered
en_quotes.author: Paul Allen

en_quotes.quote: Science is the key to our future, and if you don't believe in science, then you're holding everybody back
en_quotes.author: Bill Nye

en_quotes.quote: Baking is both an art and a science
en_quotes.author: Sherry Yard

en_quotes.quote: There is science, logic, reason; there is thought verified by experience. And then there is California
en_quotes.author: Edward Abbey

en_quotes.quote: Science can purify religion from error and superstition. Religion can purify science from idolatry and false absolutes
en_quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

en_quotes.quote: I like to learn. That's an art and a science
en_quotes.author: Katherine Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Science is nothing but perception
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Science can lift people out of poverty and cure disease. That, in turn, will reduce civil unrest
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Statistics is the grammar of science
en_quotes.author: Karl Pearson

en_quotes.quote: Science is going to be revolutionized by AI assistants
en_quotes.author: Oren Etzioni

en_quotes.quote: Specialized meaninglessness has come to be regarded, in certain circles, as a kind of hallmark of true science
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Curiosity - the rover and the concept - is what science is all about: the quest to reveal the unknown
en_quotes.author: Ahmed Zewail

en_quotes.quote: There are no shortcuts in evolution
en_quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

en_quotes.quote: The function of sociology, as of every science, is to reveal that which is hidden
en_quotes.author: Pierre Bourdieu

en_quotes.quote: Geologists have a saying - rocks remember
en_quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: Definition of Statistics: The science of producing unreliable facts from reliable figures
en_quotes.author: Evan Esar

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong with good accounting, except that it does not necessarily lead to good science
en_quotes.author: Gerhard Herzberg

en_quotes.quote: Evolution is the fundamental idea in all of life science - in all of biology
en_quotes.author: Bill Nye

en_quotes.quote: Science is the best idea humans have ever had. The more people who embrace that idea, the better
en_quotes.author: Bill Nye

en_quotes.quote: Much of the debate over global warming is predicated on fear, rather than science
en_quotes.author: Jim Inhofe

en_quotes.quote: Pursue science because it is knowledge, because it broadens our horizons. There is so much more to be discovered
en_quotes.author: Gerhard Herzberg

en_quotes.quote: I studied political science and international relations, so I never considered myself an artist
en_quotes.author: Philippe Falardeau

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge of the sciences is so much smoke apart from the heavenly science of Christ
en_quotes.author: John Calvin

en_quotes.quote: Science grows like a weed every year
en_quotes.author: Kary Mullis

en_quotes.quote: All science is either physics or stamp collecting
en_quotes.author: Ernest Rutherford

en_quotes.quote: Computer science is no more about computers than astronomy is about telescopes
en_quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

en_quotes.quote: Global Warming: It is a hoax. It is bad science. It is high-jacking public policy. It is the greatest scam in history
en_quotes.author: John Coleman

en_quotes.quote: He who possesses art and science has religion; he who does not possess them, needs religion
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: It is through science that we prove, but through intuition that we discover
en_quotes.author: Henri Poincare

en_quotes.quote: Natural science, does not simply describe and explain nature; it is part of the interplay between nature and ourselves
en_quotes.author: Werner Heisenberg

en_quotes.quote: Science is a cemetery of dead ideas
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

en_quotes.quote: Experience by itself is not science
en_quotes.author: Edmund Husserl

en_quotes.quote: The historian of science may be tempted to exclaim that when paradigms change, the world itself changes with them
en_quotes.author: Thomas Kuhn

en_quotes.quote: You cannot feed the hungry on statistics
en_quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

en_quotes.quote: Science may never come up with a better office communication system than the coffee break
en_quotes.author: Earl Wilson

en_quotes.quote: The human brain is an incredible pattern-matching machine
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: Mars is the only place in the solar system where it's possible for life to become multi-planetarian
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: God may exist, but science can explain the universe without the need for a creator
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Science is about knowing; engineering is about doing
en_quotes.author: Henry Petroski

en_quotes.quote: Observation is a passive science, experimentation an active science
en_quotes.author: Claude Bernard

en_quotes.quote: The biggest benefit of Apollo was the inspiration it gave to a growing generation to get into science and aerospace
en_quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

en_quotes.quote: When I die, I'm gonna leave my body to science fiction
en_quotes.author: Steven Wright

en_quotes.quote: Science is basically an inoculation against charlatans
en_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

en_quotes.quote: To me there has never been a higher source of earthly honor or distinction than that connected with advances in science
en_quotes.author: Isaac Newton

en_quotes.quote: Every great advance in science has issued from a new audacity of imagination
en_quotes.author: John Dewey

en_quotes.quote: Leave the atom alone
en_quotes.author: E. Y. Harburg

en_quotes.quote: Raising children is a creative endeavor, an art rather than a science
en_quotes.author: Bruno Bettelheim

en_quotes.quote: Science is the father of knowledge, but opinion breeds ignorance
en_quotes.author: Hippocrates

en_quotes.quote: From now on we live in a world where man has walked on the Moon. It's not a miracle; we just decided to go
en_quotes.author: Jim Lovell

en_quotes.quote: Healing,' Papa would tell me, 'is not a science, but the intuitive art of wooing nature.'
en_quotes.author: W. H. Auden

en_quotes.quote: Science is the great antidote to the poison of enthusiasm and superstition
en_quotes.author: Adam Smith

en_quotes.quote: Your theory is crazy, but it's not crazy enough to be true
en_quotes.author: Niels Bohr

en_quotes.quote: Advertising is fundamentally persuasion and persuasion happens to be not a science, but an art
en_quotes.author: William Bernbach

en_quotes.quote: The heart of science is measurement
en_quotes.author: Erik Brynjolfsson

en_quotes.quote: Science is not only a disciple of reason but, also, one of romance and passion
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: I had no talent for science. What was infinitely worse: all my fraternity brothers were engineers
en_quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

en_quotes.quote: The universe is made of stories, not of atoms
en_quotes.author: Muriel Rukeyser

en_quotes.quote: Biology is the science. Evolution is the concept that makes biology unique
en_quotes.author: Jared Diamond

en_quotes.quote: Ah, the creative process is the same secret in science as it is in art. They are all the same absolutely
en_quotes.author: Josef Albers

en_quotes.quote: Science and mindfulness complement each other in helping people to eat well and maintain their health and well-being
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: Science fiction is not quirky anymore; we live in a futuristic world now
en_quotes.author: Bonnie Hammer

en_quotes.quote: I think science fiction is very bad at prediction
en_quotes.author: China Mieville

en_quotes.quote: The best scientist is open to experience and begins with romance - the idea that anything is possible
en_quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

en_quotes.quote: Rockets are cool. There's no getting around that
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Moral science is better occupied when treating of friendship than of justice
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: If we reject science, we reject the common man
en_quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

en_quotes.quote: Painting is a science, and should be pursued as an inquiry into the laws of nature
en_quotes.author: John Constable

en_quotes.quote: Unfortunately the global warming hysteria, as I see it, is driven by politics more than by science
en_quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

en_quotes.quote: Psychology is the science of the intellects, characters and behavior of animals including man
en_quotes.author: Edward Thorndike

en_quotes.quote: The virtues of science are skepticism and independence of thought
en_quotes.author: Walter Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: I became kind of a drop-out in science after I came back to America. I wanted to photograph
en_quotes.author: Imogen Cunningham

en_quotes.quote: Science and religion are the two most powerful forces in the world. Having them at odds... is not productive
en_quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Human Nature is the only science of man; and yet has been hitherto the most neglected
en_quotes.author: David Hume

en_quotes.quote: You can believe what you want religiously. Religion is one thing, but science, provable science, is something else
en_quotes.author: Bill Nye

en_quotes.quote: Anyone who attempts to generate random numbers by deterministic means is, of course, living in a state of sin
en_quotes.author: John von Neumann

en_quotes.quote: Science is what we understand well enough to explain to a computer. Art is everything else we do
en_quotes.author: Donald Knuth

en_quotes.quote: Language is conceived in sin and science is its redemption
en_quotes.author: Willard Van Orman Quine

en_quotes.quote: What is research but a blind date with knowledge?
en_quotes.author: Will Harvey

en_quotes.quote: Science is the pursuit of pure truth, and the systematizing of it
en_quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

en_quotes.quote: There are no such things as applied sciences, only applications of science
en_quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

en_quotes.quote: We don't regard any scientific theory as the absolute truth
en_quotes.author: Kenneth R. Miller

en_quotes.quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success
en_quotes.author: Bruce Feirstein

en_quotes.quote: Science fiction films are not about science. They are about disaster, which is one of the oldest subjects of art
en_quotes.author: Susan Sontag

en_quotes.quote: Reason, observation, and experience; the holy trinity of science
en_quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: Science is a wonderful thing if one does not have to earn one's living at it
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: The man of science is a poor philosopher
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Democracy is the art and science of running the circus from the monkey cage
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: Every known fact in natural science was divined by the presentiment of somebody, before it was actually verified
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Men love to wonder, and that is the seed of science
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Science does not know its debt to imagination
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: The enchanting charms of this sublime science reveal only to those who have the courage to go deeply into it
en_quotes.author: Carl Friedrich Gauss

en_quotes.quote: Therefore, the good of man must be the end of the science of politics
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Romance should never begin with sentiment. It should begin with science and end with a settlement
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: To me, mathematics, computer science, and the arts are insanely related. They're all creative expressions
en_quotes.author: Sebastian Thrun

en_quotes.quote: Scientists have become the bearers of the torch of discovery in our quest for knowledge
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: The fewer the facts, the stronger the opinion
en_quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

en_quotes.quote: It is science, and not religion, which has taught men that things are complex and difficult to understand
en_quotes.author: Emile Durkheim

en_quotes.quote: Science has not yet mastered prophecy. We predict too much for the next year and yet far too little for the next 10
en_quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: Science never solves a problem without creating ten more
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: A science which does not bring us nearer to God is worthless
en_quotes.author: Simone Weil

en_quotes.quote: In science, we must be interested in things, not in persons
en_quotes.author: Marie Curie

en_quotes.quote: The universe is governed by science. But science tells us that we can't solve the equations, directly in the abstract
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Scientific theory is a contrived foothold in the chaos of living phenomena
en_quotes.author: Wilhelm Reich

en_quotes.quote: By denying scientific principles, one may maintain any paradox
en_quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

en_quotes.quote: As history has shown, pure science research ultimately ends up applying to something. We just don't know it at the time
en_quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

en_quotes.quote: There is a single light of science, and to brighten it anywhere is to brighten it everywhere
en_quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

en_quotes.quote: Computer Science is embarrassed by the computer
en_quotes.author: Alan Perlis

en_quotes.quote: Science is a differential equation. Religion is a boundary condition
en_quotes.author: Alan Turing

en_quotes.quote: No great advance has been made in science, politics, or religion without controversy
en_quotes.author: Lyman Beecher

en_quotes.quote: At its heart, engineering is about using science to find creative, practical solutions. It is a noble profession
en_quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

en_quotes.quote: On the ordinary view of each species having been independently created, we gain no scientific explanation
en_quotes.author: Charles Darwin

en_quotes.quote: I believe there are no questions that science can't answer about a physical universe
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Science fiction encourages us to explore... all the futures, good and bad, that the human mind can envision
en_quotes.author: Marion Zimmer Bradley

en_quotes.quote: Life isn't a science. We make it up as we go
en_quotes.author: Al Hirschfeld

en_quotes.quote: If you believe in science, like I do, you believe that there are certain laws that are always obeyed
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Philosophers have not kept up with modern developments in science. Particularly physics
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Science is increasingly answering questions that used to be the province of religion
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Before we understand science, it is natural to believe that God created the universe
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: The great tragedy of science - the slaying of a beautiful hypothesis by an ugly fact
en_quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Science is the knowledge of consequences, and dependence of one fact upon another
en_quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

en_quotes.quote: One of the first rules of science is if somebody delivers a secret weapon to you, you better use it
en_quotes.author: Herbert A. Simon

en_quotes.quote: Science is magic that works
en_quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

en_quotes.quote: Art is I; science is we
en_quotes.author: Claude Bernard

en_quotes.quote: Math is sometimes called the science of patterns
en_quotes.author: Ronald Graham

en_quotes.quote: In science fiction, we're always searching for new frontiers. We're drawn to the unknown
en_quotes.author: Ridley Scott

en_quotes.quote: There can be no truce between science and religion
en_quotes.author: John B. S. Haldane

en_quotes.quote: Politicians should read science fiction, not westerns and detective stories
en_quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

en_quotes.quote: Politics is a science. You can demonstrate that you are right and that others are wrong
en_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

en_quotes.quote: I've always been very one-sided about science, and when I was younger, I concentrated almost all my effort on it
en_quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

en_quotes.quote: The capacity to be puzzled is the premise of all creation, be it in art or in science
en_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is the key to my lyrics. The rest is painted with a little science fiction
en_quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

en_quotes.quote: Science fiction and fantasy is a kind of literature that embodies the highest aspirations of the human race
en_quotes.author: Harlan Ellison

en_quotes.quote: Politics is not an exact science
en_quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

en_quotes.quote: It will free man from the remaining chains, the chains of gravity which still tie him to this planet
en_quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

en_quotes.quote: As a Humanist, I love science. I hate superstition, which could never have given us A-bombs
en_quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

en_quotes.quote: All writers are going to have to learn more about science, because it's such an interesting part of their environment
en_quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

en_quotes.quote: Science fiction is the great opportunity to speculate on what could happen. It does give me, as a futurist, scenarios
en_quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

en_quotes.quote: Experimentation is an active science
en_quotes.author: Claude Bernard

en_quotes.quote: It takes time to reach the perfect shade and formulations. That's something that's in the science
en_quotes.author: Pat McGrath

en_quotes.quote: Understanding science and pushing the boundaries of science is what makes me immensely satisfied
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: I've always been interested in science - one of my favourite books is James Watson's 'Molecular Biology of the Gene.'
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: Science must begin with myths, and with the criticism of myths
en_quotes.author: Karl Popper

en_quotes.quote: I had actually studied political science in college. I had dreams of being a lawyer at one time
en_quotes.author: Michael Kelly

en_quotes.quote: Science or research is always under pressure to deliver something which can be used immediately for society
en_quotes.author: Rolf-Dieter Heuer

en_quotes.quote: We keep, in science, getting a more and more sophisticated view of our essential ignorance
en_quotes.author: Warren Weaver

en_quotes.quote: I am not a scientist. I am, rather, an impresario of scientists
en_quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

en_quotes.quote: Everything is theoretically impossible, until it is done
en_quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein
